text: Hagi henka kini ne' Deviti'a Jebusi vahe ha' huzamantenaku sondia vahe zamavarege'za Jerusalemi vu'naze. Hagi anante'ma uhanatizage'za Jebusi vahe'mo'za Devitina kiza zokago ke hunte'za anage hu'naze, Zamagama haviza hu vahe'mo'zane zamavu asuhu vahe'mo'za kama vanana kana renkani regante'sagenka kagra amafina omegahane. Hagi zamagrama antahi'zana Devitinkura kumatia taheno ohaneregahie hu'za hu'naze.
